ValidationRule.description: Don't allow entry of Numeric Characters
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"0" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"1" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"2" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"3" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"4" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"5" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"6" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"7" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"8" ) || contains ( Contact_Name__c ,"9" )
